name: Sword Smithy
description:
Sword smithy early prototype build.You can't do much yet, but things you can do:
  • Heat ingots.
  • Refill Furnace
  • Craft a sword with 1 Bronze, 1 Iron and a hammer (place all three on the anvil)
  • W and S to move objects forwards and backwards.
  • Click and drag to move the objects in the scene.
More updates coming soon...
